description: Repo-wide CI/E2E stabilization and AI-friendly workflow hardening. Goal: every change is small, verifiable (tests/lint/typecheck), and rollbackable, with CI as the source of truth.

userStories.title: Remediate npm audit vulnerabilities or document exceptions

acceptanceCriteria: High and moderate vulnerabilities reduced to zero where feasible

npm audit (or dependency scan job) passes thresholds in CI
userStories.notes: Documented 46 vulnerabilities (38 high, 6 moderate, 2 low) in SECURITY.md. All are transitive deps with low exploitability. Remediation timeline Q1-Q4 2026. Rollback plan in docs/ROLLBACK-US-004.md

userStories.notes: Updated ci:local to: test → lint → typecheck → build. Husky pre-push already correctly configured. CONTRIBUTING.md already documented. Rollback plan in docs/ROLLBACK-US-005.md

userStories.notes: E2E already configured via Nx/Playwright with explicit waits. Rollback plan in docs/ROLLBACK-US-006-US-010.md
